channel.title: Good King lost 1v1 vs Assassin
channel.description: #### What happened? Day started with King and Assassin alive. The king still had guards left. The game instantly ended without allowing the king to vote up the assassin. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? King votes up assassin and BD wins #### Steps to reproduce: Have a king vs assassin #### Comments:

item.title: Good King lost 1v1 vs Assassin
item.dc:creator: _SHIKI
item.description:
What happened?

Day started with King and Assassin alive. The king still had guards left. The game instantly ended without allowing the king to vote up the assassin.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

King votes up assassin and BD wins

Steps to reproduce:

Have a king vs assassin

Comments:
